text:
if you set a relative URL to an upper Directory and you reference a html-File, it results in ERROR http404.

example: <jsp:forward file="../upper.html" />


PS: the colors of the bugreport page are really bad selected (brown background avoid all contrast)
creator: dev@tomcat.apache.org

text: Tried this in 3.1.1, 3.2.1, 3.2.2-dev, and 3.3 and it works fine.
creator: marc.saegesser@apropos.com
